title: Conjure Woodland Beings
content:
Conjure Woodland Being Level 4 Conjuration Spell Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad. 18m Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Conjure Woodland Being

Level 4 Conjuration Spell

Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad.
